scripts.test: autocannon -d 20 -c 100 http://localhost:3000/a & autocannon -d 20 -c 100 http://localhost:3000/b & autocannon -d 20 -c 100 http://localhost:3000/c
scripts.mk-static: mkdir -p static && cd static && (dd if=/dev/random bs=1 count=10000 | split -a 4 -b 4)
scripts.mk-cache-json: node -p "JSON.stringify(require('fs').readdirSync('./static').reduce((o, f) => { f = require('fs').readFileSync('./static/' + f); o[require('./etag-fixed')(f)] = {algorithm: 'md5', encoding: 'utf8', output: 'base64', content: f}; return o  }, {}), 0, 2)" > etag-cache.json
scripts.mk-cache: npm run mk-static && npm run mk-cache-json && npm run rm-static
